name: TrainHoppin'
description:
You play as a sweet midwestern couple visiting New York City for your anniversary. The only problem is that you're lost as all hell in the subway, and can barely remember the directions a native New Yorker gave you. Choose your train wisely, or end up lost forever.....or in the Bronx. Both are bad...

The code is embedded in the png, so if you want to take a glance, go ahead!
